paper_metadata.title: MAIN TEXT
paper_metadata.extraction_summary: Extracted information on the TTR gene variants, including penetrance data and individual records.

patients.demographics: 74.8% patients with hATTR, 25.2% healthy subjects, predominantly Caucasian

individual_records.evidence_sentence: The patient developed motor and sensory neuropathy at age 40.
The patient presented with autonomic neuropathy at age 35.

functional_data.summary: The V30M mutation leads to destabilization of the TTR protein.

variants.segregation_data: The V30M variant segregates with disease in families.
variants.evidence_level: Moderate evidence based on clinical and functional studies.
variants.additional_notes: The study included a diverse population with varying degrees of penetrance.
key_quotes: V30M mutation showed no effect on the estimated IC50 value for hATTR patients.
On average, death occurs within ∼10 years from symptom onset.

tables_processed.table_caption: Summary of Subject Demographics and Baseline Laboratory Values

extraction_metadata.notes: Data was extracted thoroughly from the main text and tables.
